landingPage.description: Stop wasting valuable time tracking down your patients' implant data. Easily and securely access it from anywhere, any time, for free.

card1.title: Finding dental implant data can be such a hassle!
card1.description: Tracking down the treating doc can be exhausting, the back and forth on the phone, fax and email wastes an enormous amount of time all of it keeping you from your first priority treating your patients.

card2.title: We solve that problem with our platform.
card2.description: The treating doc securely inputs the data at the time of implant placement, the patient is notified and has access to their data so they can share it with any doc—and it's FREE

card3.title: Free, secure, easy access to your patient's info.
card3.description: We provide secure access to all doctors and patients in the system. Simply locate your patient by name and date of birth, retrieve their implant data, and you're done!

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.subtitle: Enter the code we just sent to

accountPending.title: Your account is still pending verification of your credentials as a licensed provider.
accountPending.uaTitle: Your user account is still pending verification of your credentials as a licensed provider.
accountPending.paTitle: Your practice account is still pending verification of the credentials for your practice.
accountPending.message: If this is taking longer than you expected, or for any other issue, feel free to contact Lumifi support and we’ll do our best to resolve your problem.

reactivateAccount.title: Your account was deactivated on
reactivateAccount.message: If you have changed your mind and would like to restore access to Lumifi for your practice, select ‘Reactivate Account’ below.

accountActive.title: Your account has been reactivated!
accountActive.message: You may now access the Lumifi database to search for patients, view their charts and add implant records.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lumifi!
welcome.subtitle: Creating your free account is quick and easy!

createAcc.needsVerification: Your Lumifi account will be ready to use as soon as we verify your credentials as a provider. We will email you once complete.

homePage.title: What would you like to do today?
homePage.addImplantDescription: If you just need to add an implant record for a patient, find the patient first, then add the record.
homePage.findImplantDescription: If you need to find out the information for an existing implant, find the patient, then view their chart.
